EmailTemplate.name: 27/11/2013 BSKL Term 2 Lunch Menu
EmailTemplate.subject: BSKL Term 2 Lunch Menu
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Below is the link to the lunch menu for Term 2
BSKL Term 2 Lunch Menu https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SI5/cHnw3.CrYOsTwDsRqs1WEgPp5mqz9.mJd5er0frChaw=
We would appreciate if you could select the lunch menu for your child and email them to azizan.sallehhuddin@britishschool.edu.my or hand them to the school reception no later than Friday, 6th December 2013.
Your cooperation is very much appreciated.
Kind Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
